T02TD2747E:130a-0: @130a * // jo bo thugs rje chen po yi ge drug pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2747E:130a-2: bde chen shes rab snying rje mchog / ces 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya'o //
T02TD2747E:130a-3: bde chen stong pa nyid bdag lha //
T02TD2747E:130a-4: mgon po nyid dang shes rab mchog / brtse chen rang bzhin nor bu dang //
T02TD2747E:130a-6: rnal 'byor rgyal po shes rab thabs //
T02TD2747E:130a-8: dpal ldan pha rol phyin drug dngos //
T02TD2747E:130a-9: cho ga'i dam pa 'di gsungs so //
T02TD2747E:130a-11: gsang sngags rgyal po yi ge drug / lugs 'byung ba dang lugs bzlog las //
T02TD2747E:130a-12: rgyud drug 'gog dang lam drug sbyong //
T02TD2747E:130a-13: 'bras bu drug la rab sbyor nyid //
T02TD2747E:130a-14: de bzhin rgyud drug bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2747E:130a-15: lam drug la ni sbyor ba dang //
T02TD2747E:130a-16: 'bras bu drug ni mngon du bya //
T02TD2747E:130a-17: gzi brjid drug pa zhes bshad do //
T02TD2747E:130a-19: rang bzhin gnyis med stong pa nyid //
T02TD2747E:130a-20: chos rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid de //
T02TD2747E:130a-21: 'gag pa med dang gsal med dang //
T02TD2747E:130a-24: shes rab chen po dri ma med //
T02TD2747E:130a-25: rnam par shes kun mtshan nyid de //
T02TD2747E:130a-26: ma skyes mi gnas 'gag pa med //
T02TD2747E:130a-27: gdod nas rnam grol mngon sum pa //
T02TD2747E:130a-29: snying rje chen po lhun gyis grub //
T02TD2747E:130a-30: dmigs pa kun gyi mtshan nyid de //
T02TD2747E:130a-32: skyo med re ba rnam spangs pa'o //
T02TD2747E:130a-33: chos kun mtshan med mkha' 'dra'i rnal 'byor dag pa la //
T02TD2747E:130b-0: thugs rje'i spyan @130b bskyod padmo zla dbus gzhon nu'i sku //
T02TD2747E:130b-1: zhal gcig phyag bzhi ji bzhin phyag rgyas mtshan pa dang /
T02TD2747E:130b-2: de bzhin g-yas g-yon nor bu padmo 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2747E:130b-3: dam tshig rdo rje lha gsum la //
T02TD2747E:130b-4: ye shes mkha' spyod gsum bcug la //
T02TD2747E:130b-5: thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i //
T02TD2747E:130b-6: rnal 'byor rim pas bzlas par bya //
T02TD2747E:130b-7: lha yi rim pas sngags rim bzhin //
T02TD2747E:130b-8: rnam gsum rdzogs pa'i rim pa yang //
T02TD2747E:130b-9: mkhas pas 'bad de bsgom par bya //
T02TD2747E:130b-10: dpal 'jig rten mgon po yi ge drug pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
